description: Erection of single storey roof extension and replacement of windows, plus change of use of existing hostel to provide 14 x two-bedroom, 3 x one-bedroom and 3 x self-contained studio units for temporary occupation.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Design and Access Statement, Planning Statement, Lifetime Homes Statement, Planning Obligations (Section 106), 577/00/#; 01/A; 02/A; 03/#; 04/A; 08/A; 09/# (LBI REG: 24841), Site Waste Management Plan, Energy and Sustainability Statement, Transport Statement, Procurement Services (Part B - Specification), Lightwell window layout (LBI: 24842), Accessible Housing Statement (Revision A dated 08/04/2010), 577/05/B; 06/B; 07/B (LBI: 24843).

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
